scenes.description: Final illustration and a handwritten thank-you message from Tsunomaki Watame to her fans (Watamates) at the conclusion of her 2023 Birthday 3D Live.

subtitles.original: みんな、いつもありがとう！
これからも一緒に、夢を叶えていこうね！
subtitles.english: Let's continue to make our dreams come true together!

subtitles.original: I ❤️ わためいと　わため
